channel.title: Error connecting to server?
channel.description: Everything's running fine with the source and the client is up, but I cant log in. I'm getting Error connecting to server from my client. How can i fix this?

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @em0bunny em0bunny
item.description:
@em0bunny wrote:

I searched the whole of the client folders for the ip that the source was displaying and it was not there…not in any of the folders or notepad folders or anything…This was after I redownloaded.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

you are supposed to add the ip to the CLIENT client file not to the SOURCE files.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @em0bunny em0bunny
item.description:
@em0bunny wrote:

I went to client.java in my client folder and changed it to 127.0.0.1 but when I run the source it still says “Server listening on port 25.87.48.32:43594” and am still getting the error connecting to server. I’m searching the ip “25.87.48.32” in my source folder but it says that it’s not in there?? Maybe it’s because my compiler isnt working??

EDIT: I actually got my compiler to work but im still getting the 25.87.48.32 msg and error connecting to server.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

YOu have to be on localhost which is 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
